newsitem.title: USA: Kmart to acquire 20 stores from Venture.
newsitem.headline: Kmart to acquire 20 stores from Venture.

text.p: Kmart Corp said Thursday it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire 20 stores from Venture Stores Inc.
Under the agreement, Kmart will assume occupancy of the sites about 60 days after closing, following a liquidation of inventory by Venture, Kmart said.
Of the 20 stores, 10 are located in Houston, five in Dallas, two in Indianapolis, and one each in Tulsa, Okla., Des Moines, Iowa and Waterloo, Iowa, the retailer said.

"These stores fit well with Kmart's existing locations in key metropolitan areas and will add significantly to our market penetration in the Dallas and Houston markets," said Larry Kellar, Kmart vice president for real estate.
Terms of the transaction with Venture were not disclosed.
